title: However, structures included in the common area comprising of original plots and final plots shall not be treated as contravening structures
clause_text: However, structures included in the common area comprising of original plots and final plots shall not be treated as contravening structures.
section: 33(12).Redevelopment of contravening structures included in the Final Plot of a Town Planning (TP) Scheme and Removal and re- accommodation of tolerated structures falling in the alignment of road:

source_pdf.text_snippet: However, structures included in the common area comprising of original plots and final plots shall not be treated as contravening structures.
